id.comment: Set 1 - Test syntax of calls. Calls syntax, LHS synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; Select pr such that Calls(pr, pr1)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; stmt s; Select pr such that Calls(s, pr)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; assign a; Select pr such that Calls(pr, a)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS invalid synonym RHS invalid synonym

query.querystr: print pn; variable v; Select pn such that Calls(pn, v)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS synonym RHS wildcard

query.querystr: procedure procedure; Select procedure such that Calls(procedure, _)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS wildcard RHS synonym

query.querystr: procedure procedure; Select procedure such that Calls(_, procedure)

id.comment: Calls, syntax, LHS wildcard RHS wildcard

query.querystr: procedure Calls; Select Calls such that Calls(_, _)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS synonym RHS Ident

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, "E")

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS synonym RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, "K")

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS Ident RHS synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("C", pr)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS synonym

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("A1", pr)

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS Ident RHS Ident

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("A", "B")

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS Ident

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Calls("B", "G")

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS Ident RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Calls("I", "F")

id.comment: Calls syntax, LHS invalid Ident RHS invalid Ident

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Calls("F", "J")

id.comment: Set 2 - Test direct and indirect calls. Calls directness, Direct true 1

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Calls("A", "B")

id.comment: Calls directness, Direct true 2

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Calls("C", "E")

id.comment: Calls directness, Direct true 3

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("J", "H")

id.comment: Calls directness, Direct false 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("A", "C")

id.comment: Calls directness, Direct false 2

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Calls("B", "A")

id.comment: Calls directness, Direct false 3

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Calls("E", "E")

id.comment: Calls directness, Indirect 1

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Calls("C", "G")

id.comment: Calls directness, Indirect 2

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Calls("I", "E")

id.comment: Calls directness, Indirect 3

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Calls("J", "D")

id.comment: Set 3 - Test calls at different nesting. Calls nesting, In if 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("C", "D")

id.comment: Calls nesting, In if 2

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("C", "E")

id.comment: Calls nesting, In while 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("D", "E")

id.comment: Calls nesting, In while 2

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("I", "H")

id.comment: Calls nesting, In multiple nested 1

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Calls("E", "G")

id.comment: Calls nesting, In multiple nested 2

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Calls("H", "G")

id.comment: Set 4 - Relation tests for calls*. Relation, Calls itself

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, pr)

id.comment: Relation, Calls non-existent

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, "N")

id.comment: Relation, Called by non-existent

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("P", pr)

id.comment: Relation, Reverse calls

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Calls("B", "A")

id.comment: Relation, Select all caller

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; Select pr such that Calls(pr, pr1)

id.comment: Relation, Select all callee

query.querystr: procedure pr, pr1; Select pr1 such that Calls(pr, pr1)

id.comment: Relation, Select all callee of a specific caller 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("I", pr)

id.comment: Relation, Select all callee of a specific caller 2

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("C", pr)

id.comment: Relation, Select all caller of a specific callee 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, "E")

id.comment: Relation, Select all caller of a specific callee 2

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, "G")

id.comment: Relation, Select result not related

query.querystr: constant c; procedure pr; Select c such that Calls("A", pr)

id.comment: Relation, Select all callee of a procedure that does not call 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("B", pr)

id.comment: Relation, Select all callee of a procedure that does not call 2

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls("F", pr)

id.comment: Relation, Select all caller of a procedure that is not called 1

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, "J")

id.comment: Relation, Select all caller of a procedure that is not called 2

query.querystr: procedure pr; Select pr such that Calls(pr, "F")
